class.name: Rect3
class.description: Rect3 provides an 3D Axis-Aligned Bounding Box. It consists of a position, a size, and several utility functions. It is typically used for simple (fast) overlap tests.

method.name: Rect3
method.description: Optional constructor, accepts position and size.

method.name: encloses
method.description: Return true if this [Rect3] completely encloses another one.

method.name: expand
method.description: Return this [Rect3] expanded to include a given point.

method.name: get_area
method.description: Get the area of the [Rect3].

method.name: get_endpoint
method.description: Get the position of the 8 endpoints of the [Rect3] in space.

method.name: get_longest_axis
method.description: Return the normalized longest axis of the [Rect3].

method.name: get_longest_axis_index
method.description: Return the index of the longest axis of the [Rect3] (according to [Vector3]::AXIS* enum).

method.name: get_longest_axis_size
method.description: Return the scalar length of the longest axis of the [Rect3].

method.name: get_shortest_axis
method.description: Return the normalized shortest axis of the [Rect3].

method.name: get_shortest_axis_index
method.description: Return the index of the shortest axis of the [Rect3] (according to [Vector3]::AXIS* enum).

method.name: get_shortest_axis_size
method.description: Return the scalar length of the shortest axis of the [Rect3].

method.name: get_support
method.description: Return the support point in a given direction. This is useful for collision detection algorithms.

method.name: grow
method.description: Return a copy of the [Rect3] grown a given amount of units towards all the sides.

method.name: has_no_area
method.description: Return true if the [Rect3] is flat or empty.

method.name: has_no_surface
method.description: Return true if the [Rect3] is empty.

method.name: has_point
method.description: Return true if the [Rect3] contains a point.

method.name: intersection
method.description: Return the intersection between two [Rect3]. An empty Rect3 (size 0,0,0) is returned on failure.

method.name: intersects
method.description: Return true if the [Rect3] overlaps with another.

method.name: intersects_plane
method.description: Return true if the [Rect3] is at both sides of a plane.

method.name: intersects_segment
method.description: Return true if the [Rect3] intersects the line segment between from and to

method.name: merge
method.description: Combine this [Rect3] with another, a larger one is returned that contains both.
